overview: "Greta Garbo" is a man who possesses the secret of a recipe, or an actor/actress who insists and hopes to always be a muse for someone. The illusion, the power that this creates, its allure, but also its sense of loneliness and insecurity that grips, and finally chooses vanity as a possible substitute for love. A project for Damir Todorovic - artist, actor and performer.
title: Greta Garbo
